data.title: Michael Connelly Book Recommendations & Book Mentions
data.text:
This list consists of recommendations or mentions of books spotted in media, social media accounts, podcasts or other public websites.

Michael Connelly on X

Michael Connelly is an author. Harry Bosch, Mickey Haller, Renée Ballard, Jack McEvoy... This is the official Twitter account for author Michael Connelly, run by his social media manager.

29 books

Every Cloak Rolled in Blood

James Lee BurkeMichael Connelly

James Lee Burke is usually a late summer release but the good news is Every Cloak Rolled in Blood is already out and I can’t wait to read the master’s latest work.

Paperback , 2023

$ 17.99$ 8.99 + Free shipping50 % off your first book

Tomorrow, and Tomorrow, and Tomorrow

Gabrielle ZevinMichael Connelly

You get so invested so fast in Sadie and Sam that this story about the fragility of creativity and love becomes a page-turner you just can’t put down.

Hardcover , 2022

$ 28.00$ 14.00 + Free shipping50 % off your first book

The Wild Bunch: Sam Peckinpah, a Revolution in Hollywood, and the Making of a Legendary Film

W. K. StrattonMichael Connelly

And finally, Titus Welliver recommended I read The Wild Bunch: Sam Peckinpah, a Revolution in Hollywood and the Making of a Legendary Film. I always take Titus’ recommendations seriously. I got the book. - MC

Paperback , 2020

$ 18.00$ 9.00 + Free shipping50 % off your first book

The Brass Verdict

Michael ConnellyMichael Connelly

The Lincoln Lawyer star Manuel Garcia-Rulfo and author Michael Connelly read from The Brass Verdict, the book that inspired The Lincoln Lawyer series on Netflix https://t.co/XqMekhMgjl via @YouTube

Paperback , 2016

$ 17.99$ 8.99 + Free shipping50 % off your first book

The Law of Innocence

Michael ConnellyMichael Connelly

The virtual book tour for The Law Of Innocence continues on Monday. @BloodyScotland presents Michael Connelly and Ian Rankin @Beathhigh at 7:30pm (BST). Register here: https://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/bloody-scotland-presents-michael-connelly-and-ian-rankin-tickets-124683418461

Paperback , 2021

$ 19.99$ 9.99 + Free shipping50 % off your first book

The Gods of Guilt

Michael ConnellyMichael Connelly

UK Readers: The Gods of Guilt (Mickey Haller Series Book 5) eBook is just 99p this month. https://www.amazon.co.uk/Gods-Guilt-Mickey-Haller-Book-ebook/dp/B00C2UUDMG/ref=mp_s_a_1_1?crid=3IEW3HEUBX5YI&keywords=the+gods+of+guilt+michael+connelly&qid=1651421516&s=books&sprefix=the+gids+of+%2Caps%2C238&sr=1-1

$ 19.99$ 9.99 + Free shipping50 % off your first book

The Wrong Side of Goodbye

Michael ConnellyMichael Connelly

So cool! The Wrong Side Of Goodbye is on a six-story @amazonbooks billboard in NYC! Don’t miss the book that inspired the @boschamazon series: https://amzn.to/3vXH76Z https://t.co/lzt31LMIRi

Paperback , 2017

$ 19.99$ 9.99 + Free shipping50 % off your first book

Michael ConnellyMichael Connelly

RT @KevinHillier: Authorised is back with international best selling author Michael Connelly @Connellybooks He chats about The Dark Hours h…

Paperback, Mass Market , 2022

$ 10.99$ 5.49 + Free shipping50 % off your first book

Harlem Shuffle

Colson WhiteheadMichael Connelly

Virtual events this month: MC will interview @colsonwhitehead about his new novel, HARLEM SHUFFLE, on Sep 22 for @BNBuzz. Link: https://bit.ly/3tk0GDM MC will interview @JamesQueallyLAT about his new novel, ALL THESE ASHES, on Sep 30 for @BookSoup. Link: https://bit.ly/3jWZsLL
